content:
PHASE 4 COORDINATION

SHARE and OBSERVE - multi-agent access and change notification.

Module ownership:
- Agent share: owns SHARE endpoint, access control
- Agent observe: owns OBSERVE endpoint, change tracking
- Agent discovery: owns notebook listing endpoint

DEPENDENCY GRAPH:
```
Task 4.1 (SHARE) ----+
                     +--> Task 4.3 (event streaming - optional)
Task 4.2 (OBSERVE) --+

Task 4.4 (discovery) - independent
```

ALL TASKS CAN RUN IN PARALLEL - no hard dependencies within Phase 4.

NOTE: Phase 4 runs in parallel with Phase 3.
author: orchestrator
